technologies.name: Prismic
technologies.description: Prismic is a headless CMS for Jamstack.

technologies.name: Node.js
technologies.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

technologies.name: Vue.js
technologies.description: Vue.js is an open-source model–view–viewmodel JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

technologies.name: Nuxt.js
technologies.description: Nuxt is a Vue framework for developing modern web applications.

technologies.name: Plausible
technologies.description: Plausible is an open-source alternative to Google Analytics.

technologies.name: Sendinblue
technologies.description: Sendinblue is an email marketing solution for small and medium-sized businesses that want to send and automate email marketing campaigns.

technologies.name: Sendgrid
technologies.description: SendGrid is a cloud-based email delivery platform for transactional and marketing emails.

technologies.name: Google Workspace
technologies.description: Google Workspace, formerly G Suite, is a collection of cloud computing, productivity and collaboration tools.

technologies.name: Imperva
technologies.description: Imperva is a cyber security software and services company for networking, data, and application security.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.
